name: Beam Puzzle
description:
Solve levels by directing the beam of light to hit each gem by arranging the mirror pieces. Easy to learn but tricky to master. Somehow there never seem to be enough pieces.

  • Drag the movable mirror pieces around the screen to discover how the beam interacts with the level.
  • Over 50 increasingly hard levels will challenge your analytical skills
  • Some puzzles look impossible until the solution clicks into place
